regex.name: makelist2
regex.listrepeat: <title>[makelist2.param2]</title> <link>$doregex[get-m3u8]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0</link> <referer></referer> <thumbnail></thumbnail>

regex.name: select
select-source
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re
url = 'https://www.arconaitv.me/' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer' : ''} select='[makelist.param1]' select = select.replace('[', '').replace(']', '') if select == 'Movies': end = '' elif select == 'Channels': end = 'Cable' elif select == 'Cable Tv': end = '<li id="menu-item-209"'
r1 = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
part = re.findall('%s(?s)(.*)%s' % (select,end), r1.text)[-1] part = part.replace('&','&') return part

regex.name: get-m3u8
get-source-page
get-url
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='[makelist2.param1]'):
import requests import re import urllib url = urllib.unquote_plus(url)
headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ''} r1 = requests.get(url, headers=headers) cookie = re.findall('Cookie (.*?) for', str(r1.cookies))[-1] data_sh = re.findall('data-sh="(.*?)"', r1.text)[0]
print data_sh
data ={'h': data_sh}
url = 'http://www.streamgaroo.com/calls/get/source'
r2 = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=data)
embed = re.findall('link": "(.*?)"', r2.text)[0] embed = embed.replace('\/','/') r3 = requests.get(embed, headers=headers) if 'hls' in r3.text: m3u8 = re.findall("hls','(.*?)'", r3.text)[0]
return m3u8 + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0&Referer=http://www.streamgaroo.com/player/GrindPlayer.swf&Cookie=' + cookie
else: if 'streaming-hub' in r3.text: embed = re.findall('get\("(.*?)"', r3.text)[0] r4 = requests.get(embed, headers=headers) link = re.findall('iframe frameborder=.*?src="(.*?)"', r4.text)[0] f4m = link.replace('embed.html?dvr=false&','manifest.f4m?')
f4m = urllib.quote_plus(f4m) f4m = 'plugin://plugin.video.f4mTester/?url=' + f4m return f4m
else: rtmp = re.findall("rtmp','(.*?)'", r3.text)[0]
return rtmp

regex.name: get-source
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m, offon= '[makelist.param1]', title= '[makelist.param2]'):
import requests import re url = 'http://urhd.tv/' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer' : ''} r1 = requests.get(url, headers=headers) source= r1.text.replace('false', 'Offline').replace('true', 'En Linea') return source

Univision HD $doregex[get-url]|User-Agent=iPad
get-url #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='http://v2.ustreamix.com/stream.php?id=univision'): import re, requests hdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_2 like Mac OS X)'} html = requests.get(url,headers=hdr,verify=False).text uip = re.findall("x_first_ip = '(.*?)'",html,re.DOTALL)[0] ohtm = eval(re.findall('Obfuscator.*?var.*?(\[.*?\])',html,re.DOTALL)[0]) oval = int(re.findall('replace.*?- (\d*)',html)[0]) phtml = '' for oht in ohtm: phtml += chr(int(re.findall('\D*(\d*)',oht.decode('base64'))[0]) - oval) strurl = re.findall("var stream = '(.*?)'",phtml)[0] hdr['Referer'] = url tokpg = requests.get('https://wakwaw2.ga/stats.php?p=%s'%uip,headers=hdr,verify=False).text token = re.findall('jdtk="(.*?)"',tokpg)[0] return strurl+token

<div class="news searchres hov".*?\n.*?a href="(.*?)".*?\n.*?\n.*?src="(.*?)".*?\n.*?h2>(.*) http://www.dw.com/es/multimedia/todos-los-contenidos/s-100838?filter=&type=18&programs=294151&sort=date&results=250
get-rtmp #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests,urllib import re part_url= '[makelist.param1]' url = 'http://www.dw.com/es' + urllib.quote(part_url)
source = requests.get(url).text id= re.findall('media_id" value="(.*?)"', source)[0] url2 = 'http://www.dw.com/smil/v-' + id source2 = requests.get(url2).text rtmp = re.findall('base="(.*?)"', source2)[0] playpath = re.findall('video src="(.*?)"', source2)[0] return rtmp + playpath

#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re frames = re.findall('(<iframe.*?>)',page_data) part = 1 parts = [] for frame in frames: parts.append(('Part: %s'%part,frame)) part += 1 return parts
http://www.sonbolumizlesene.org[makelist2.param1]
link #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import urlresolver, re, requests headers = {"User-Agent" : "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:14.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/14.0.1"} eurl = 'http:' + re.findall('iframe.*?src="(.*?)"','[makelist3.param2]')[0] if '/matplayer/' in eurl: html = requests.get(eurl, headers=headers).text if 'sources' in html: u = 'http://sonbolumizlesene.org' + re.findall('(?s)sources:.*?"SD".*?file: "(.*?)"',html)[0] else: vid = re.findall(r'/video/([^?]*)',html)[0] u = 'plugin://plugin.video.dailymotion_com/?mode=playVideo&url=' + vid elif 'dailymotion' in eurl: parms = re.findall('data-x="(.*?)" data-my="(.*?)"','[makelist3.param2]')[0] data = {'x' : parms[1], 'y' : parms[0]} headers['X-Requested-With']='XMLHttpRequest' headers['MYSONB']='1' headers['Referer']='http://www.sonbolumizlesene.org/' jdata = requests.post('http://www.sonbolumizlesene.org/son.php', headers=headers, data=data).json() vid = re.findall(r'/video/([^?]*)',jdata['x'])[0] u = 'plugin://plugin.video.dailymotion_com/?mode=playVideo&url=' + vid else: u = 'notresolvable' if urlresolver.HostedMediaFile(eurl): u = urlresolver.resolve(eurl) return u

<title>[makelist.param2]</title> <link>$doregex[resolve]</link> <thumbnail>https://i.ytimg.com/vi/[makelist.param1]/hqdefault.jpg</thumbnail>
u'(.+?)', u'(.+?)' $doregex[search]
resolve #$pyFunction import urlresolver def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url = 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=[makelist.param1]' streamLink = urlresolver.resolve(url) return streamLink
search #$pyFunction import requests,xbmcgui,xbmc, re,time, xbmcaddon def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
text=takeInputFortext('Enter search string') url = 'https://www.youtube.com/results?q=' + text.replace(' ', '+') req = requests.get(url) list1 = re.findall('yt-lockup-c.+?a\shref=".watch.v=([^"]+)".+?\s\stitle="([^"]+)"\s', req.text)
count = 10 while count > 1: try: url = 'https://www.youtube.com' + re.findall('a href="([^"]+)".+<\/a>\n <\/div>', req.text)[0] except: return list1 req = requests.get(url) list2 = re.findall('yt-lockup-c.+?a\shref=".watch.v=([^"]+)".+?\s\stitle="([^"]+)"\s', req.text) list1 = list1 + list2 count = count - 1 return list1
def takeInputFortext(txt): addon = xbmcaddon.Addon('plugin.video.live.streamspro') addon_version = addon.getAddonInfo('version') profile = xbmc.translatePath(addon.getAddonInfo('profile').decode('utf-8'))
solver = InputWindow( txt=txt) solution = solver.get() return solution
class InputWindow(xbmcgui.WindowDialog): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
self.txt = kwargs.get('txt','')
xbmcgui.WindowXMLDialog.__init__(self) #self.addControl(self.txt) path = xbmcaddon.Addon().getAddonInfo('path') self.kbd = xbmc.Keyboard() self.kbd.setHeading( self.txt)
def get(self): self.show() time.sleep(2) self.kbd.doModal() if (self.kbd.isConfirmed()): text = self.kbd.getText() self.close() return text self.close() return False
